1: A mother talked with her son about active shooter drills
2: The mother only had fire and tornado drills while growing up
3: The son and his teacher block the door with a desk
4: The students stand against the back wall
5: The son stays in front of the class
6: The son wants to take the bullet
7: The mother wants her son to be selfish
8: The son is adamant in his decision
9: He says it is the right thing to do
10: The mother is always speechless after talking about this
11: The son says, “you raised a good son”
